mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO order_outbound_target_stock ( item_code, em_qty, first_qty, second_qty, d3_qty, upload_date,created_at, modified_at ) VALUES
(#{item.itemCode}, #{item.emQuantity}, #{item.firstQuantity}, #{item.secondQuantity}, #{item.dPlus3Quantity}, #{item.uploadDate}, #{item.createdDate}, #{item.modifyDate})
ON CONFLICT (item_code, upload_date) DO UPDATE SET em_qty = CASE WHEN order_outbound_target_stock.em_qty IS DISTINCT FROM EXCLUDED.em_qty THEN EXCLUDED.em_qty ELSE order_outbound_target_stock.em_qty END, first_qty = CASE WHEN order_outbound_target_stock.first_qty IS DISTINCT FROM EXCLUDED.first_qty THEN EXCLUDED.first_qty ELSE order_outbound_target_stock.first_qty END, second_qty = CASE WHEN order_outbound_target_stock.second_qty IS DISTINCT FROM EXCLUDED.second_qty THEN EXCLUDED.second_qty ELSE order_outbound_target_stock.second_qty END, d3_qty = CASE WHEN order_outbound_target_stock.d3_qty IS DISTINCT FROM EXCLUDED.d3_qty THEN EXCLUDED.d3_qty ELSE order_outbound_target_stock.d3_qty END, modified_at = now() WHERE order_outbound_target_stock.em_qty IS DISTINCT FROM EXCLUDED.em_qty OR order_outbound_target_stock.first_qty IS DISTINCT FROM EXCLUDED.first_qty OR order_outbound_target_stock.second_qty IS DISTINCT FROM EXCLUDED.second_qty OR order_outbound_target_stock.d3_qty IS DISTINCT FROM EXCLUDED.d3_qty

INSERT INTO order_car ( category, supplier, alc, item_code, t_time, result, line, yra, in_house, inspection, ct, long_term, oem,
d, d_plus1, d_plus2, d_plus3, d_plus4, d_plus5, d_plus6, d_plus7, d_plus8, d_plus9, d_plus10, d_plus11, d_plus12, d_plus13, d_plus14, d_plus15, d_plus16, d_plus17, d_plus18, d_plus19, d_plus20, rem, ct_location, upload_date,
created_at, modified_at, factory ) VALUES
( #{item.category}, #{item.supplier}, #{item.alc}, #{item.itemCode}, #{item.tTime}, #{item.result}, #{item.line}, #{item.yra}, #{item.inhouse}, #{item.inspection}, #{item.container}, #{item.longTerm}, #{item.oem},
#{item.d}, #{item.dPlus1}, #{item.dPlus2}, #{item.dPlus3}, #{item.dPlus4}, #{item.dPlus5}, #{item.dPlus6}, #{item.dPlus7}, #{item.dPlus8}, #{item.dPlus9}, #{item.dPlus10}, #{item.dPlus11}, #{item.dPlus12}, #{item.dPlus13}, #{item.dPlus14}, #{item.dPlus15}, #{item.dPlus16}, #{item.dPlus17}, #{item.dPlus18}, #{item.dPlus19}, #{item.dPlus20}, #{item.rem}, #{item.ctLocations}, #{item.uploadDate},
#{item.createdDate}, #{item.modifyDate}, #{item.factory} )

insert.if:
INSERT INTO order_mes_stock_box ( item_code, box1, box2, box3, box4, box5, box6, box7, box8, box9, box10, box11, box12, box13, box14, box15, box16, box17, box18, box19, box20, box21, box22, box23, box24, box25, box26, box27, box28, box29, box30, created_at, modified_at ) VALUES
( #{item.itemCode}, #{item.box1}, #{item.box2}, #{item.box3}, #{item.box4}, #{item.box5}, #{item.box6}, #{item.box7}, #{item.box8}, #{item.box9}, #{item.box10}, #{item.box11}, #{item.box12}, #{item.box13}, #{item.box14}, #{item.box15}, #{item.box16}, #{item.box17}, #{item.box18}, #{item.box19}, #{item.box20}, #{item.box21}, #{item.box22}, #{item.box23}, #{item.box24}, #{item.box25}, #{item.box26}, #{item.box27}, #{item.box28}, #{item.box29}, #{item.box30}, #{item.createdDate}, #{item.modifyDate} )

INSERT INTO order_ops_plan_raw ( st_date, car_props, region, nation, door_type, engine_capa, transmission, mc, st_month1, st_month2, st_month3, st_month4, st_month5, etc, customer, responder, upload_date, created_at, modified_at ) VALUES
( #{item.stDate}, #{item.carProps}, #{item.region}, #{item.nation}, #{item.doorType}, #{item.engineCapa}, #{item.transmission}, #{item.mc}, #{item.stMonth1}, #{item.stMonth2}, #{item.stMonth3}, #{item.stMonth4}, #{item.stMonth5}, #{item.etc}, #{item.customer}, #{item.responder}, #{item.uploadDate}, #{item.createdDate}, #{item.modifyDate} )

INSERT INTO order_ops_plan_raw_agg ( st_date, car_props, group_props, st_month1_agg, st_month2_agg, st_month3_agg, st_month4_agg, st_month5_agg, created_at, modified_at, etc ) VALUES
( #{item.stDate}, #{item.carProps}, #{item.groupProps}, #{item.stMonth1Agg}, #{item.stMonth2Agg}, #{item.stMonth3Agg}, #{item.stMonth4Agg}, #{item.stMonth5Agg}, #{item.createdDate}, #{item.modifyDate}, #{item.etc} )

INSERT INTO common_std_outsourcing_cost ( part_no, price_set, product_code, mat_cost, labor_cost, changing_cost, fixed_cost, out_sourcing_cost, total_cost, mat_cost_down, labor_cost_down, changing_cost_down, fixed_cost_down, out_sourcing_cost_down, cost_modify_date, groups, groups2, car_props_type, car_props, freezing, created_at ) VALUES
( #{item.partNo}, #{item.priceSet}, #{item.productCode}, #{item.matCost}, #{item.laborCost}, #{item.changingCost}, #{item.fixedCost}, #{item.outSourcingCost}, #{item.totalCost}, #{item.matCostDown}, #{item.laborCostDown}, #{item.changingCostDown}, #{item.fixedCostDown}, #{item.outSourcingCostDown}, #{item.costModifyDate}, #{item.groups}, #{item.groups2}, #{item.carPropsType}, #{item.carProps}, #{item.freezing}, #{item.createdDate} )

INSERT INTO common_outsourcing_cost ( price_list, name, price_unit, product_code, part_no, groups, groups2, unit, start_date, end_date, etc, explanation, out_sourcing_cost, modify_date, factory, car_props_type, std_unit, created_at ) VALUES
( #{item.priceList}, #{item.name}, #{item.priceUnit}, #{item.productCode}, #{item.partNo}, #{item.groups}, #{item.groups2}, #{item.unit}, #{item.startDate}, #{item.endDate}, #{item.etc}, #{item.explain}, #{item.outSourcingCost}, #{item.modifyDate}, #{item.factory}, #{item.carPropsType}, #{item.stdUnit}, #{item.createdDate} )

INSERT INTO order_ops_plan_production_rate ( st_date, car_item, door_type, region, partno, rate, responder, month1_rate, month2_rate, month3_rate, month4_rate, month5_rate, created_at, modified_at ) VALUES
( #{item.stDate}, #{item.carItem}, #{item.doorType}, #{item.region}, #{item.partNo}, #{item.rate}, #{item.responder}, #{item.rateByMonth1}, #{item.rateByMonth2}, #{item.rateByMonth3}, #{item.rateByMonth4}, #{item.rateByMonth5}, #{item.createdDate}, #{item.modifyDate} )

INSERT INTO pdm_sap_order ( 접수일자, 품목유형, alc, 운전석방향, 지역, air_bag, 품목명, 품목번호, 공장, 품목개정, 회로갯수, 실적계, trim, 라인재고, 유라, oem, 사내재고, 검사대기, 입고대기, 입하대기, 조립, 서브, set_완료, set_작업중, total, weihai, rizhao, dezhou, vina, d0, d1, d2, d3, d4, d5, d6, d7, d8, d9, d10, d11, d12, d13, d14, d15, d16, d17, d18, d19, d20, d21, d22, d23, d24, d25, d26, d27, d28, d29, d30, rem, h_total, m, 차월, mitu, 장기성재고, created_at, modified_at ) VALUES
( #{item.uploadDate}, #{item.carProps}, #{item.alc}, #{item.doorType}, #{item.region}, #{item.airBag}, #{item.groupProps}, #{item.partNo}, #{item.factory}, #{item.version}, #{item.circuitCount}, #{item.result}, #{item.trim}, #{item.line}, #{item.yra}, #{item.oem}, #{item.inhouse}, #{item.inspection}, #{item.ct}, #{item.ct2}, #{item.assembly}, #{item.sub}, #{item.setComplete}, #{item.setProcessing}, #{item.total}, #{item.weihai}, #{item.rizhao}, #{item.dezhou}, #{item.vina}, #{item.day0}, #{item.day1}, #{item.day2}, #{item.day3}, #{item.day4}, #{item.day5}, #{item.day6}, #{item.day7}, #{item.day8}, #{item.day9}, #{item.day10}, #{item.day11}, #{item.day12}, #{item.day13}, #{item.day14}, #{item.day15}, #{item.day16}, #{item.day17}, #{item.day18}, #{item.day19}, #{item.day20}, #{item.day21}, #{item.day22}, #{item.day23}, #{item.day24}, #{item.day25}, #{item.day26}, #{item.day27}, #{item.day28}, #{item.day29}, #{item.day30}, #{item.rem}, #{item.hTotal}, #{item.m}, #{item.nextMonth}, #{item.mitu}, #{item.longStock}, #{item.createdDate}, #{item.modifyDate} )

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO order_mes_stock_outbound (item_code, outbound_date, out_qty, created_at, modified_at) VALUES
(#{item.itemCode}, #{item.outboundDate}, #{item.outQuantity}, #{item.createdDate}, #{item.modifyDate})
ON CONFLICT (item_code, outbound_date) DO UPDATE SET out_qty = EXCLUDED.out_qty WHERE order_mes_stock_outbound.out_qty IS DISTINCT FROM EXCLUDED.out_qty
mapper.select: SELECT c.item_code FROM UNNEST(#{itemCodeArray, jdbcType=ARRAY}) AS C (item_code) LEFT JOIN order_mes_box m ON C.item_code = m.item_code WHERE m.item_code IS NULL

SELECT c.item_code FROM UNNEST(#{itemCodeArray, jdbcType=ARRAY}) AS c (item_code) LEFT JOIN order_mes_stock m ON c.item_code = m.item_code AND m.FACTORY IN ('B1', 'E1', 'F1') GROUP BY c.item_code HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT m.FACTORY) < 3
SELECT c.item_code FROM UNNEST(#{itemCodeArray, jdbcType=ARRAY}) AS C (item_code) LEFT JOIN order_mes_stock_box m ON C.item_code = m.item_code WHERE m.item_code IS NULL
SELECT id AS id, item_code AS itemCode, box_1 AS box1, box_2 AS box2, box_3 AS box3, box_4 AS box4, box_5 AS box5, created_at AS createdDate, modified_at AS modifyDate FROM order_mes_box
SELECT id AS id, factory AS factory, item_code AS itemCode, qty AS quantity, created_at AS createdDate, modified_at AS modifyDate FROM order_mes_stock

SELECT car_props as carProps, etc as etc, SUM(st_month1) as M_Prod, SUM(st_month2) as M1_Prod, SUM(st_month3) as M2_Prod, SUM(st_month4) as M3_Prod, SUM(st_month5) as M4_Prod FROM order_ops_plan_raw WHERE responder = '세원' AND st_date = #{stDate}
AND (car_props, etc) IN
(#{pair.carProps}, #{pair.etc})
GROUP BY car_props, etc

WITH tmp_raw AS ( SELECT car_props, door_type, region, sum(st_month1) AS m1_total, sum(st_month2) AS m2_total, sum(st_month3) AS m3_total, sum(st_month4) AS m4_total, sum(st_month5) AS m5_total FROM order_ops_plan_raw GROUP BY car_props, door_type, region ) SELECT CONCAT(a.car_props, ' ', a.group_props) AS carItem, b.door_type, b.region, b.m1_total, b.m2_total, b.m3_total, b.m4_total, b.m5_total FROM order_ops_plan_raw_agg a LEFT JOIN tmp_raw b ON a.car_props = b.car_props ORDER BY carItem;
SELECT DISTINCT st_date FROM order_ops_plan_last_mon_agg ORDER BY st_date DESC LIMIT 1;
